### Translation

Sad it is to live by yourself. To see a beautiful sunset and not being able to describe to anyone nor the light of the stars far away, nor the sound of the see, nor the smell of the trees, or the tranquility of the wind.   
You need to live so that there will be with whom to share all the unearthly beauty that you see and hear, because it sad is to live by yourself.

Sad it is to dream and to know that noone will see your dreams, everything that you create with much love there - nor the gargen full of roses growing in winter, nor the chord that you've heard in the moonlight.   
Yet, all that is born from the heart has the power to fly so high and so far! And it won't take too long before your gardern will all be full bloom and your chord will be played all around!

  По-другому уже никогда:
  Словно воздух — любовь, красота.

  Вспомни, как любил —
  Окажешься снова ты там,
  Где царит красота...
   
Где бы не был я – 
Всегда со мною радость бытия!

2017
